speaker: THURIO
text:
Sir
               
              Proteus
              ,
               
              what
               
              says
               
              Sylvia
               
              to
               
              my
               
              suit
              ?

speaker: PROTEUS
text:
O
               
              sir
              ,
               
              I
               
              find
               
              her
               
              milder
               
              than
               
              she
               
              was
              ,

speaker: PROTEUS
text:
And
               
              yet
               
              she
               
              takes
               
              exceptions
               
              at
               
              your
               
              person
              .

speaker: THURIO
text:
What
              ?
               
              That
               
              my
               
              leg
               
              is
               
              too
               
              long
              ?

speaker: PROTEUS
text:
No
              ,
               
              that
               
              it
               
              is
               
              too
               
              little
              .

speaker: THURIO
text:
I’ll
               
              wear
               
              a
               
              boot
               
              to
               
              make
               
              it
               
              somewhat
               
              rounder
              .

speaker: JULIA
text:
But
               
              love
               
              will
               
              not
               
              be
               
              spurred
               
              to
               
              what
               
              it
               
              loathes
              .

speaker: THURIO
text:
What
               
              says
               
              she
               
              to
               
              my
               
              face
              ?

speaker: PROTEUS
text:
She
               
              says
               
              it
               
              is
               
              a
               
              fair
               
              one
              .

speaker: THURIO
text:
Nay
              ,
               
              then
               
              the
               
              wanton
               
              lies
              ;
               
              my
               
              face
               
              is
               
              black
              .

speaker: PROTEUS
text:
But
               
              pearls
               
              are
               
              fair
              ,
               
              and
               
              the
               
              old
               
              saying
               
              is
              ,

speaker: PROTEUS
text:
Black
               
              men
               
              are
               
              pearls
               
              in
               
              beauteous
               
              ladies’
               
              eyes
              .

speaker: JULIA
text:
’Tis
               
              true
              ,
               
              such
               
              pearls
               
              as
               
              put
               
              out
               
              ladies’
               
              eyes
              ,

speaker: JULIA
text:
For
               
              I
               
              had
               
              rather
               
              wink
               
              than
               
              look
               
              on
               
              them
              .

speaker: THURIO
text:
How
               
              likes
               
              she
               
              my
               
              discourse
              ?

speaker: PROTEUS
text:
Ill
              ,
               
              when
               
              you
               
              talk
               
              of
               
              war
              .

speaker: THURIO
text:
But
               
              well
               
              when
               
              I
               
              discourse
               
              of
               
              love
               
              and
               
              peace
              .

speaker: JULIA
text:
But
               
              better
              ,
               
              indeed
              ,
               
              when
               
              you
               
              hold
               
              your
               
              peace
              .

speaker: THURIO
text:
What
               
              says
               
              she
               
              to
               
              my
               
              valor
              ?

speaker: PROTEUS
text:
O
              ,
               
              sir
              ,
               
              she
               
              makes
               
              no
               
              doubt
               
              of
               
              that
              .

speaker: JULIA
text:
She
               
              needs
               
              not
               
              when
               
              she
               
              knows
               
              it
               
              cowardice
              .

speaker: THURIO
text:
What
               
              says
               
              she
               
              to
               
              my
               
              birth
              ?

speaker: PROTEUS
text:
That
               
              you
               
              are
               
              well
               
              derived
              .

speaker: JULIA
text:
True
              ,
               
              from
               
              a
               
              gentleman
               
              to
               
              a
               
              fool
              .

speaker: THURIO
text:
Considers
               
              she
               
              my
               
              possessions
              ?

speaker: PROTEUS
text:
O
              ,
               
              ay
              ,
               
              and
               
              pities
               
              them
              .

speaker: THURIO
text:
Wherefore
              ?

speaker: JULIA
text:
That
               
              such
               
              an
               
              ass
               
              should
               
              owe
               
              them
              .

speaker: PROTEUS
text:
That
               
              they
               
              are
               
              out
               
              by
               
              lease
              .

speaker: JULIA
text:
Here
               
              comes
               
              the
               
              Duke
              .

speaker: DUKE
text:
How
               
              now
              ,
               
              Sir
               
              Proteus
              ?
              —
              How
               
              now
              ,
               
              Thurio
              ?

speaker: DUKE
text:
Which
               
              of
               
              you
               
              saw
               
              Eglamour
               
              of
               
              late
              ?

speaker: THURIO
text:
Not
               
              I
              .

speaker: PROTEUS
text:
Nor
               
              I
              .

speaker: DUKE
text:
Saw
               
              you
               
              my
               
              daughter
              ?

speaker: PROTEUS
text:
Neither
              .

speaker: DUKE
text:
Why
              ,
               
              then
              ,
               
              she’s
               
              fled
               
              unto
               
              that
               
              peasant
              ,
               
              Valentine
              ,

speaker: DUKE
text:
And
               
              Eglamour
               
              is
               
              in
               
              her
               
              company
              .

speaker: DUKE
text:
’Tis
               
              true
              ,
               
              for
               
              Friar
               
              Lawrence
               
              met
               
              them
               
              both

speaker: DUKE
text:
As
               
              he
              ,
               
              in
               
              penance
              ,
               
              wandered
               
              through
               
              the
               
              forest
              ;

speaker: DUKE
text:
Him
               
              he
               
              knew
               
              well
               
              and
               
              guessed
               
              that
               
              it
               
              was
               
              she
              ,

speaker: DUKE
text:
But
              ,
               
              being
               
              masked
              ,
               
              he
               
              was
               
              not
               
              sure
               
              of
               
              it
              .

speaker: DUKE
text:
Besides
              ,
               
              she
               
              did
               
              intend
               
              confession

speaker: DUKE
text:
At
               
              Patrick’s
               
              cell
               
              this
               
              even
              ,
               
              and
               
              there
               
              she
               
              was
               
              not
              .

speaker: DUKE
text:
These
               
              likelihoods
               
              confirm
               
              her
               
              flight
               
              from
               
              hence
              .

speaker: DUKE
text:
Therefore
               
              I
               
              pray
               
              you
               
              stand
               
              not
               
              to
               
              discourse
              ,

speaker: DUKE
text:
But
               
              mount
               
              you
               
              presently
               
              and
               
              meet
               
              with
               
              me

speaker: DUKE
text:
Upon
               
              the
               
              rising
               
              of
               
              the
               
              mountain
               
              foot

speaker: DUKE
text:
That
               
              leads
               
              toward
               
              Mantua
              ,
               
              whither
               
              they
               
              are
               
              fled
              .

speaker: DUKE
text:
Dispatch
              ,
               
              sweet
               
              gentlemen
              ,
               
              and
               
              follow
               
              me
              .

speaker: THURIO
text:
Why
              ,
               
              this
               
              it
               
              is
               
              to
               
              be
               
              a
               
              peevish
               
              girl

speaker: THURIO
text:
That
               
              flies
               
              her
               
              fortune
               
              when
               
              it
               
              follows
               
              her
              .

speaker: THURIO
text:
I’ll
               
              after
              ,
               
              more
               
              to
               
              be
               
              revenged
               
              on
               
              Eglamour

speaker: THURIO
text:
Than
               
              for
               
              the
               
              love
               
              of
               
              reckless
               
              Sylvia
              .

speaker: PROTEUS
text:
And
               
              I
               
              will
               
              follow
              ,
               
              more
               
              for
               
              Sylvia’s
               
              love

speaker: PROTEUS
text:
Than
               
              hate
               
              of
               
              Eglamour
               
              that
               
              goes
               
              with
               
              her
              .

speaker: JULIA
text:
And
               
              I
               
              will
               
              follow
              ,
               
              more
               
              to
               
              cross
               
              that
               
              love

speaker: JULIA
text:
Than
               
              hate
               
              for
               
              Sylvia
              ,
               
              that
               
              is
               
              gone
               
              for
               
              love
              .
